name: ETHER (dakoting)
description:
ETHER

WARNING: This game contains flashing images and content which some viewers might find disturbing.

A short, 2D puzzle game with horror elements in which you play as a child traversing through a dark labyrinth in order to awaken a demon.

CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys

Interact - Spacebar/Left Click

Exit Game - Escape

ESTIMATED RUN TIME: 10-20 minutes

Follow me on twitter for updates on future projects: @dakoting
